EmailTemplate.name: 2018 Dealer Update #12.2018 Dealer Update #12
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Sales Bulletin Updates
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Sales Bulletin | July 2018
JetWave Center of Excellence
- This sales bulletin details the incentives of the JetWave Center of Excellence program. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2018-27 Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2018-27 Rev A Jetwave Center of Excellence.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2018 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0y02I00QXr0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
GoDirect Jet ConneX Dealer Incentive Program
- This sales bulletin describes dealer incentives for the Honeywell GoDirect Jet Connex Service. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2018-29. - Dealers can find 2018 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0y02I00QXr0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins
JetWave Financing Option
- This sales bulletin provides information about a new JetWave financing option for chartered or leased aircraft. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2018-32. - Dealers can find 2018 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0y02I00QXr0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins
Ku to Ka Radome Incentive Program
- This sales bulletin describes incentives for Ku Radome sales and conversion to the Ka Radome once it is certified in 2019. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2018-33. - Dealers can find 2018 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0y02I00QXr0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
